entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this morning and ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
